statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_achievements;
SELECT athlete_id, personal_record FROM athlete_achievements WHERE competition_won='Olympics';
SELECT certification_earned, athlete_id FROM athlete_achievements ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, personal_record, competition_won FROM athlete_achievements WHERE certification_earned IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_id, certification_earned FROM athlete_achievements WHERE certification_earned LIKE '%Certified%' ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_achievements WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT personal_record, certification_earned FROM athlete_achievements WHERE competition_won = 'Gold Medal';
SELECT athlete_id, personal_record, competition_won FROM athlete_achievements ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_achievements WHERE competition_won = 'Silver Medal' AND certification_earned IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT athlete_id) AS total_athletes FROM athlete_achievements;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, record_time, record_date FROM PersonalRecords;
SELECT * FROM CompetitionWins;
SELECT athlete_id, competition_name, competition_date FROM CompetitionWins WHERE rank = 1;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name FROM PersonalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, competition_name, rank FROM CompetitionWins ORDER BY athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM PersonalRecords WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name FROM PersonalRecords WHERE record_time > '12:00:00' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(rank) AS highest_rank FROM CompetitionWins GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM CompetitionWins ORDER BY competition_date ASC, rank DESC;
SELECT AVG(rank) AS average_rank FROM CompetitionWins WHERE competition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM personal_records;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name FROM personal_records WHERE record_value >= 10;
SELECT athlete_id, record_date FROM personal_records WHERE event_name = 'Marathon';
SELECT * FROM competitions_won WHERE competition_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT athlete_id, certification_name FROM certifications_earned ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, record_value, record_date FROM personal_records WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, record_value FROM personal_records WHERE record_value > 10 ORDER BY record_date DESC

SELECT athlete_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications_earned WHERE athlete_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(athlete_id) AS total_certifications FROM certifications_earned GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING COUNT(athlete_id) > 1
SELECT athlete_id, competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions_won ORDER BY competition_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM personal_records;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, record_date FROM personal_records WHERE record_value > 100;
SELECT athlete_name, height, weight FROM athletes ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitions_won WHERE competition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization FROM certifications_earned WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes
SELECT event_name, record_value, record_date FROM personal_records WHERE record_value > 10
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, record_value, record_date FROM personal_records JOIN athletes ON personal_records.athlete_id = athletes.athlete_id

SELECT athlete_name, certification_name, certification_date, issuing_organization FROM certifications_earned JOIN athletes ON certifications_earned.athlete_id = athletes.athlete_id WHERE athletes.height > 180
SELECT athlete_name, competition_name, competition_date, winning_position FROM competitions_won JOIN athletes ON competitions_won.athlete_id = athletes.athlete_id WHERE athletes.weight < 70
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes
SELECT athlete_name, nationality FROM athletes WHERE nationality = 'USA'
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications_earned ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT competition_name, competition_date, rank FROM competitions_won WHERE rank <= 3
SELECT event_name, personal_best, date_achieved FROM personal_records
SELECT athlete_name, nationality FROM athletes;
SELECT * FROM competitions_won WHERE rank = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications_earned ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM athletes ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT event_name, personal_best FROM personal_records WHERE personal_best > 10 ORDER BY personal_best DESC;
